name: Vacuum Insulation Panel Association
legal: 501 (c) (6) not-for-profit association incorporated under the law of the State of Delaware in the United States of America
bossPosition: President of the Board of Directors
membership: VIPA International is a liaison organisation to the CEN TC 88 WG 11 Vacuum insulation products (VIP)
memberOrga: The updated list of members is available on the VIPA website: http://vipa-international.org/members
goal: VIPA International mission statement is to act as the global voice of the vacuum insulation panel industry, promote quality and raise awareness about the potential of saving space and energy costs and reducing carbon dioxide emissions in a wide range of applications and industries.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Directive 2012/27/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 25 October 2012 on energy efficiency;
Directive 2002/91/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 December 2012 on the Energy Performance of Buildings;
Energy Labelling legislation of household appliances;
Circular Economy Package;
Packaging and transport related policies
